37d7935a9d7b86635c9c1ffc03f88b49857f88a0.commitMessage:
YARN-827. Need to make Resource arithmetic methods accessible^CJian He via bikas)

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/hadoop/common/trunk@1495533 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
37d7935a9d7b86635c9c1ffc03f88b49857f88a0.diff:
@@ -0,0 +1,13 @@
+  public Resource multiplyAndNormalizeDown(Resource r, double by,
+      Resource stepFactor) {
+    return Resources.createResource(
+        roundDown(
+            (int)(r.getMemory() * by), 
+            stepFactor.getMemory()
+            ),
+        roundDown(
+            (int)(r.getVirtualCores() * by), 
+            stepFactor.getVirtualCores()
+            )
+        );
+  }
